meanings.sent1: Her deceptiveness made it hard to trust her.
meanings.sent2: The deceptiveness of the magician's tricks amazed the audience.
meanings.sent3: The deceptiveness of the mirror made her look taller than she actually was.
meanings.sent4: The deceptiveness of the calm waters hid the dangerous currents underneath.
meanings.sent5: The deceptiveness of the online advertisement led to many disappointed customers.

meanings.definition: The act of deceiving or misleading.
meanings.sent1: His deceptiveness was revealed when his lies were uncovered.
meanings.sent2: The deceptiveness of the con artist fooled many unsuspecting victims.
meanings.sent3: The deceptiveness of the fake news article spread misinformation.
meanings.sent4: The deceptiveness of the camouflage made it hard to spot the hidden animal.
meanings.sent5: The deceptiveness of the trap caught the clever fox off guard.
